summary:
16-year experience in software testing, performing activities related to the test life cycle such as preparing test environments, preparing test plans, writing test cases (Testlink, Excel, Word, and TFS), performing manual tests, carrying out test estimation, extraction, and analysis of test result reports and test automation using Complete Test (1 year).
Experience in the strategic leadership of test teams.
Experience in technical leadership and responsible for the realization of full verification and validation product release/verifiation and validation life cycle management to ensure quality and compliance.
The focal point of the team for process creation and adaptation related to activities of verification and validation for the following certifications: ISO 9001:2015, ISO 13485:2016, CE Mark (MDD and MDR), and Anvisa.
Ensuring full Product Safety Risk Management in a regulation-compliant manner.
Improve and optimize verification and validation coverage and process.
Support in defining new strategies for test creation, test execution, automation, test execution, script validation and validation activities.
Leadership of the system team and support in defining initial strategies and partnership with Design Team for customer journey training and design thinking tools, follow-up of activities with the team.
Leader of the standard definition and good practices for test cases writing, reviewing, approving, executing and storage in TFS.
Definition and organization of internal training for knowledge transfer.
Collaboration in defining the improvement in the workflow of the Agile methodology in order to raise the quality of story refinement, Sprint planning, unit tests, integrated and systemic phases.
Member of the Diversity and Inclusion team at Philips, acting as a leader of the women's pillar.

Education:
-	UNIASSELVI University, Blumenau, SC
MBA in leadership and coaching, Jun 2019
-	Unicamp University, Campinas, SP
Software Engineer Specialization, Dec 2009
-	São Francisco University, Itatiba, SP 
Bachelor/Major of Computer Science, Dec 2003
-	Paula Souza Center, Amparo, SP
Technical Accounting, Dec 1997

Languages:
-	English: fluent (speaking, reading, writing).
-	Spanish: advanced (speaking, reading, writing).

Certifications:
-	CTFL (Certified Tester Foundation Level) - ISTQB - 2013
-	Certified Scrum Master - Scrum Alliance - 2017
-	SAFe 4.0 for Teams Course - Scaled Agile, Inc. - 2017.  

Brazilian with Italian Citizenship

currentPositions.description:
• Experience in technical leadership and responsible for the realization of full verification and validation product release/verifiation and validation life cycle management to ensure quality and compliance. 
• Experience in the strategic leadership and approach of Verification and validation teams.
• Member of the standard definition and good practices for test cases writing, reviewing, approving,
• Member of the test team, with activities, mostly focus on process and certifications/regulations;
• The focal point of the team for process creation and adaptation related to activities of verification and validation for the following certifications: ISO 9001:2015, ISO 13485:2016, CE Mark (MDD and MDR), and Anvisa.
• Support to the creation and maintenance of processes linked directly or indirectly with the test teams (Brazil and India)
• Improve and optimize verification and validation coverage and process.
• Ensuring full Product Safety Risk Management in a regulation-compliant manner.
• Coordination and support in the validation phase of Vital Health products.
• Support in defining new strategies for test creation, test execution, automation, test execution, script validation and validation activities.
• Leadership of the system team and support in defining initial strategies and partnership with Design Team for customer journey training and design thinking tools, follow-up of activities with the team.
• Worked as a Capa Owner
• Implementation of PEPF 12.4 for Tasy EMR in verification and validation processes.
currentPositions.title: Tests Specialist - EMR & CM

message.text:
Hoje fazem exatamente sete anos que larguei tudo emprego, cidade, amigos, família por uma oportunidade de trabalhar na Philips em Blumenau.
Tive muitas dúvidas e incertezas no início por muitas vezes pensei em voltar, e o tempo foi passando e comecei meu amor pela empresa cada vez mais aumentando. 
Cultivei e cultivo muitas amizades que sei que são pra vida toda.
Não me arrependo da minha escolha e hoje tenho certeza que foi a melhor escolha que fiz.
Que venham mais 7 anos de trabalho nessa empresa Maravilhosa que eu só tenho a agradecer.

commentary.text: Mais do que merecido amiga parabéns 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
